channel.title: John Carmichael
channel.description: Recent news about John Carmichael, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Pleased with unemployment falling to near post-recession low of 7.1% with the creation of +59,200 net new jobs in August! #CDNpoli #eap2013

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: L'Shanah Tovah to the Jewish community in #DonValleyWest Wishing you health & Happiness in the new year #RoshHashanah http://t.co/zRKaKiSFl9

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Canada's financial system has been ranked safest & soundest in the world by the World Economic Forum. Number one for sixth straight year!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Canada projected to lead economic growth among G7 nations in 2013. Another sign our Conservative Gov't is on the right track! #CDNpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Despite the Alberta Flood and Quebec construction strike the Canadian economy grew 1.7% in the second quarter of 2013! #cdnpoli #eap2013

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great time at Thorncliff Park Tennants Assoc 2nd annual back to school fun fair. Lots of sun and fun. Congrats Abbas Kolia & all volunteers.
